mapper.sql: supplierID, companyName, companyAbbreviation, contacts, phone, email, telePhone, province, city, region, street
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM supplier where 1=1
and province like '%${province}%'
and city like '%${city}%'
and region like '%${region}%'
and companyname like '%${selectqb}%' OR companyabbreviation like '%${selectqb}%' OR contacts like '%${selectqb}%' OR phone like '%${selectqb}%' OR email like '%${selectqb}%' OR telephone like '%${selectqb}%'
mapper.insert: insert into supplier (supplierID, companyName, companyAbbreviation, contacts, phone, email, telePhone, province, city, region, street) values (#{supplierid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{companyname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyabbreviation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contacts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{region,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{street,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

companyName = #{companyname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
